summary:
100% Immersive playthrough of a man who lost his parents to vampires when he was a boy and was sent off to Honorhall Orphanage in Riften until he had come of age.
A life of nightmares has guided him to Dawnstar. Where will his dreams take him from there? Where will fate lead him?
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]NrigCIVOoGg&list=PLlN8weLk86XgZuzeFd5divciGk2e3XKCQ[/youtube]

100% Immersive playthrough of a man who lost his parents to vampires as a boy and was sent off to Honorhall Orphanage in Riften until he had come of age.
A life of nightmares has guided him to Dawnstar. Where will his dreams... where will destiny take him from there?

-Higher Quality Videos available for download in the Files section above.

-Links to the Videos on the GamerPoets Channel below.
1 . [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NrigCIVOoGg]CH 1 Prequel - The Tale of Paxton[/url]
2 . [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AezZbVfqoxE]CH 1 Part 1 - The Tale of Paxton[/url]
3 . [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kf4dCmTbgv4]CH 1 Part 2 - The Tale of Paxton[/url] Who knows what tomorrow brings?
4 . [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h5ofwrY4gQI]CH 1 Part 3 - The Tale of Paxton[/url] When Fall will fall and break the Spring?
5 . [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D1j-C_HbaZQ]CH 1 Part 4 - The Tale of Paxton[/url] From Winters back? When Summer dies?
6 . [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gXscU_-DqPA]CH 1 Part 5 - The Tale of Paxton[/url] Born to walk blind with open eyes.
7 . [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=woJx694VYQE]CH 1 Part 6 - The Tale of Paxton[/url] -M.R.Thompson of gamerpoets
8 . [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=av3nRhZ60CE]CH 1 Part 7 - The Tale of Paxton[/url]
